name: Dash Craft
description:
A game made for LOWREZJAM 2017 in 4 days

Controls : 

- Move with mouse
- LMB to Dash
- Press "F" for fullscreen (recommended)
- RMB to locate your ship in the battlefield

- Fullscreen if you play on web mode

- If the web version lags, try out the downloadable one

Features :

- Fast Paced Gameplay

- minimalist graphics

- Juicy Gameplay and Explosions

- Highscores!

--- Thanks for playing :)
--- want to leave a feedback and how great/worse the game is?
